aboutPage.historyIntro: Founded in 2020, Digital Hub Agency was born with the purpose of democratizing access to quality digital solutions. We started as a small team of developers and designers passionate about technology and today we are a reference in digital transformation for companies of all sizes.

hero.title: About Digital Hub Agency
hero.subtitle: Transforming ideas into innovative digital solutions since 2020

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Founded in 2020, Digital Hub Agency was born with the purpose of democratizing access to quality digital solutions. We started as a small team of developers and designers passionate about technology and today we are a reference in digital transformation for companies of all sizes.

mvv.title: Mission, Vision and Values
mvv.missionText: Empower companies through innovative digital solutions that generate real and sustainable results.
mvv.visionText: To be recognized as Brazil's leading digital agency, a reference in innovation and excellence in service.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Specialized professionals passionate about what they do

teamMembers.seoBio: Expert in search engine optimization and organic growth strategies.
teamMembers.securityBio: Professional focused on digital security and data protection for web applications.
teamMembers.trafficBio: Expert in paid traffic campaigns and digital advertising performance analysis.
teamMembers.designBio: Creative designer focused on user experience and impactful visual interfaces.
